Augusta-Richmond_County.River Place Condominiums: River Place Condominiums, previously known as Port Royal Condominiums, is a mixed-use residential high-rise building located in Augusta, Georgia. Standing at 312 feet (95 meters) tall with 18 floors, it is tallest building in Augusta and the Central Savannah River Area. It has become an iconic part of the city's skyline, with the exterior of the building having a pink salmon color and concrete structure, along with having a postmodern style with multiple gables at the top.
